title: Do Not Enter The Mirrors
itunes:title: Do Not Enter The Mirrors
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Are you sure?

***

Written by Kyle Harrison and narrated by Michelle Kane

***

Bonus Episode: I Spent The Night in a Serial Killer's Murder Cellar", written by R.M. Staniforth, narrated by Nate Dufort

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
